## min() function

Returns the minimum value of an array.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function min(array: number[]): number;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  array | <code>number[]</code> | the array to get the minimum of |

<b>Returns:</b>

`number`

the minimum value
